name: Alphabet Phonics - Talking Alphabet Lite
description:
Welcome to Alphabet Phonics

The amazing alphabet phonics app for the iPhone and iPad

Great for children learning the alphabet and how to pronounce phonics

The app has two main features

Letters board - Listen to the sound of the letter and also the phonics.

A simple, colourful and easy app to learn phonics.

Voiced by the award winning British voiceover artist Guy Harris
